services-page.title: Online Medical Consultations: Healthcare at Your Fingertips

text.question: How can we assist you?
text.goal: We are always with you on the path to success.
text.paragraph: We are happy to hear your news and see your developments from time to time, and we look forward to knowing how things are going for you. Welcome back! If this is your first visit, we are glad you chose us, and we trust that we will earn your satisfaction.

card1.title: Instant Medical Consultations via Video
card1.text: Connect directly with specialized doctors from various medical fields through comfortable and secure video consultations...

card2.title: Easily Book Medical Appointments
card2.text: Save time and effort with a straightforward appointment booking system. Choose the right doctor and book your appointment...

card3.title: Manage Your Entire Medical Record
card3.text: You can fully manage your medical record through the app, including your personal information and medical history...

card4.title: 24/7 Support and Assistance
card4.text: We’re always here to help. Our medical support team is available around the clock to answer your questions and inquiries...

r1.name: Ziad Al-Washmi
r1.text: As a parent of two children, it's hard to find time to go to clinics. The Shour platform has made medical consultations extremely easy.

card1.title: Ear, Nose, and Throat (ENT) Medicine
card1.description: With the Shour Medical Platform, getting a medical consultation has never been easier. Through online medical consultations, you can now communicate with a select group of specialized doctors directly from your home or anywhere else...
card1.name: Dr. Khaled Al-Anzi

card2.title: How Do Online Medical Consultations Work?
card2.description: The Shour platform allows you to communicate with qualified and certified doctors through interactive video consultations. You can ask your medical questions, discuss your health condition, and receive a quick diagnosis and recommendations for appropriate treatment...
card2.name: Dr. Khaled Al-Anzi
